thefoodietrails: For me the switch happened when I saw the times write I dia season 3 Contest. I had been a 2 time winner in the first season, but this time I had been so wrapped up that I didn't know it had started! There was just 2 days to the deadline , I read the prompt, we needed to write a 3000 word story based on the prompt. I brief story line flashed in my mind, I started writing, kept writing, and after an Entire night's work , I was exhilarated to have written after almost 1 year. Start small.
